ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
PrecisApproval for STATISTICAL SURVEY OPERATIONS (SSO) to enter into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Public Service Alliance of Canada (PSAC) on behalf of the Interviewers and Senior Interviewers who work primarily in Statistics Canada Regional Offices (OFFICE INTERVIEWERS), with an expiry date of November 30, 2011.
